job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: Nice to meet youltbrgtltbrgtSimply put were a growth firm Leading companies hire us to help their organizations reach their full potential by putting people first and creating change that matters How you ask We help our clients find and engage new markets ampamp customers pioneer new ventures and create new products services and business models that will transform their organizationsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWho We WantltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWe love passionately curious people who think of themselves as lifelong learners They are humble engaging and intelligent They have strong opinions with open minds They are proactive and entrepreneurialltbrgtltbrgtCritical thinking is their sharpest tool and they fearlessly tackle tough problems They understand that understanding is a key part of building trust and driving positive outcomes Thats why they lead with empathymotivating internally and externally and having the hard conversations when neededltbrgtltbrgtThey believe that teams do it best and the best outcomes come from hearing perspectives that arent their own At Three Five Two we push for everyone to find and use their voice and respecting each others is nonnegotiableltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhats the Day to Day RoleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWe are looking for a Data Scientist to help our clients and internal teams interpret and act on their data You will work alongside diverse teams of passionate strategists researchers developers designers and marketers to create comprehensive business strategies and digital solutions Your clients could include SaaS products startups Fortune 100 companies and moreltbrgtltbrgtWe are looking for someone with a solid blend of technical aptitude strategic thinking and great communication skillsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligt2 years working in a data science roleltligt ltligtComfortable using SQL and working with data across disparate complex data sourcesltligt ltligtStrong knowledge of Python or Rltligt ltligtStrong understanding of applied statistics and machine learning algorithms including methodologies for regressions classification clustering and causalityltligt ltligtExcellent ability to interpret problems synthesize analysis and present information in an effective wayltligt ltligtAble to confidently build data science driven solutions to understand and solve business challengesltligt ltligtStrong communication skills and comfort working directly with partners and clientsltligt ltligtEnthusiasm for learning and desire to develop new skillsltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggtExtra Creditltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligtExperience with experimental design and AB Testing analysisltligt ltligtComfortable using BI tools including Tableau and PowerBIltligt ltligtExperience working directly with software development teams and deploying data science solutionsltligt ltligtPrevious consulting or professional services experienceltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltugtltstronggtBenefitsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll Getltbrgtltulgt ltligtFreedom We trust you to do your thing and do it wellltligt ltligtProfessional Development We set aside a training budget because we want to invest in youltligt ltligtBenefits Health and dental insurance employermatch 401K retirement program PTO policy and moreltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggtA few more important things we as a company support understand ampamp value ltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligtBlack lives matterltligt ltligtGreat ideas and talent can come from anywhereltligt ltligtNontraditional paths are OKltligt ltligtSo are traditional onesltligt ltbrgtltulgtWe welcome people from all backgrounds who seek the opportunity to help build a future where everyone and everything can move independently If you have curiosity passion and collaborative spirit work with us and lets move the world forward togetherltbrgtltbrgtThree Five Two is an Equal Opportunity Employer and Prohibits Discrimination and Harassment of Any Kind Three Five Two is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment All employment decisions at Three Five Two are based on business needs job requirements and individual qualifications without regard to civil union or domestic partnership status past or present military service family medical history or genetic information family or parental status or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate Three Five Two will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics Three Five Two encourages applicants of all ages Three
